title: Mapping the climate and agronomic digital advisory services landscape in West and Central Africa: A step towards making food systems productive and climate resilient
description: This study explores and examines the availability of digital agricultural solutions (DAGs) to enhance agricultural resilience in the face of climate change. The countries under study—Burundi, Ivory coast, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC), Ghana, Nigeria, an…
